overview: Sex is suppressed in the 19th Century. Beneath the petticoats, hoop-skirts, and tight trousers, lust begs to be unleashed! Bolivia, a married woman, seeks her freedom from this stifling sexual isolation. Mark Davis has returned from the war in colonial Africa, totally disenchanted. A mysterious statue magically entangles Bolivia, Mark and others in a torrid erotic adventure, teaming with complete carnality. Watch as no explicit detail is left unturned, no taboo goes unexplored. You are held in the grip of the Sex Spell!
title: Sex Spell
